targets.rawSql:
WITH all_tables AS (
    SELECT 'Hypertables' AS type, h.hypertable_schema || '.' || h.hypertable_name AS name
    FROM timescaledb_information.hypertables h

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 'PostgreSQL tables' AS type, t.table_schema || '.' || t.table_name AS name
    FROM information_schema.tables t
    WHERE t.table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
      AND t.table_schema NOT IN (
          'pg_catalog', 'information_schema',
          '_timescaledb_catalog', '_timescaledb_internal'
      )
      AND NOT EXISTS (
          SELECT 1
          FROM timescaledb_information.hypertables h
          WHERE h.hypertable_schema = t.table_schema
            AND h.hypertable_name = t.table_name
      )
),

continuous_aggregates AS (
    SELECT 'Continuous aggregates' AS type, c.view_schema || '.' || c.view_name AS name
    FROM timescaledb_information.continuous_aggregates c
),

materialized_views AS (
    SELECT 'Materialized views' AS type, m.schemaname || '.' || m.matviewname AS name
    FROM pg_matviews m
)

SELECT type, COUNT(*) AS total
FROM (
    SELECT * FROM all_tables
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM continuous_aggregates
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM materialized_views
) t
GROUP BY type
ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT
    t.tablename AS name,
    CASE 
        WHEN ht.hypertable_name IS NOT NULL THEN hypertable_size(ht.hypertable_schema || '.' || ht.hypertable_name)
        ELSE pg_total_relation_size(t.schemaname || '.' || t.tablename)
    END AS size_bytes
FROM pg_tables t
LEFT JOIN timescaledb_information.hypertables ht
    ON ht.hypertable_schema = t.schemaname
   AND ht.hypertable_name = t.tablename
WHERE t.schemaname = '$schema'
ORDER BY size_bytes DESC;

SELECT
    ts.table_bytes + ts.toast_bytes AS "Data + TOAST size",
    ts.index_bytes AS "Size of indexes",
    ts.table_bytes + ts.index_bytes + ts.toast_bytes AS "Total size",
    approximate_row_count(format('%I.%I', '$schema', '$table')::regclass) AS "Approx row count"
FROM pganalyze.table_stats ts
WHERE ts.relid = format('%I.%I', '$schema', '$table')::regclass::oid
ORDER BY ts.collected_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  collected_at AS time,
  table_bytes AS "Data size",
  index_bytes AS "Index size",
  toast_bytes AS "TOAST size"
FROM pganalyze.table_stats
WHERE relid = format('%I.%I', '$schema', '$table')::regclass::oid
  AND $__timeFilter(collected_at)

SELECT
    ht.num_chunks AS "Chunks",
    d.time_interval AS "Chunk time interval",
    ht.compression_enabled AS "Compression"
FROM timescaledb_information.dimensions d
JOIN timescaledb_information.hypertables ht ON ht.hypertable_schema = d.hypertable_schema AND ht.hypertable_name = d.hypertable_name
WHERE ht.hypertable_schema = '$schema'
    AND ht.hypertable_name = '$table'

SELECT
    c.chunk_name AS "Name",
    (cds).total_bytes AS "Size",
    (cds).index_bytes AS "Index size",
    c.is_compressed AS "Compressed",
    c.range_start::text AS "Start time",
    c.range_end::text   AS "End time"
FROM timescaledb_information.chunks c
JOIN LATERAL chunks_detailed_size('$schema' || '.' || '$table') AS cds ON cds.chunk_name = c.chunk_name
WHERE c.hypertable_schema = '$schema'
    AND c.hypertable_name = '$table'
ORDER BY range_end DESC;

panels.description: Num. distinct (*) means a fraction-based extimate

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    a.attname AS "Name",
    pg_catalog.format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod) AS "Type",
    COALESCE(ROUND((s.null_frac * 100)::numeric, 2), 0) AS "Null %",
    COALESCE(s.avg_width, 0) AS "Avg. size (bytes)",
    CASE
        WHEN s.n_distinct IS NULL THEN 'n/a'
        WHEN s.n_distinct < 0 THEN
            (ROUND(((-s.n_distinct) * c.reltuples)::numeric)::TEXT || '*')
        ELSE
            s.n_distinct::TEXT
    END AS "Num. distinct",
    CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM pg_index i
            WHERE
                i.indrelid = a.attrelid
                AND a.attnum = ANY(i.indkey)
        ) THEN 'yes'
        ELSE 'no'
    END AS "Indexed?"
FROM
    pg_attribute a
    JOIN pg_class c ON a.attrelid = c.oid
    JOIN pg_namespace n ON c.relnamespace = n.oid
    LEFT JOIN pg_stats s ON
        s.schemaname = n.nspname
        AND s.tablename = c.relname
        AND s.attname = a.attname
WHERE
    n.nspname = '$schema'
    AND c.relname = '$table'
    AND a.attnum > 0
    AND NOT a.attisdropped
ORDER BY
    a.attnum;

panels.title: Columns

targets.rawSql:
WITH index_list AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (i.indexrelid)
        i.indexrelid AS index_id,
        c.relname    AS index_name,
        i.size_bytes AS size_bytes
    FROM pganalyze.index_stats i
    JOIN pg_class c ON c.oid = i.indexrelid
    WHERE i.relid = format('%I.%I', '$schema', '$table')::regclass::oid
    ORDER BY i.indexrelid, i.collected_at DESC
)
SELECT
    il.index_id   AS "ID",
    il.index_name AS "Name",
    am.amname || ' (' || string_agg(pg_get_indexdef(il.index_id, k + 1, true), ', ') || ')' AS "Definition",
    CASE
        WHEN ix.indisprimary THEN 'PRIMARY KEY'
        WHEN ix.indisunique  THEN 'UNIQUE'
        ELSE NULL
    END AS "Constraint",
    il.size_bytes AS "Size"
FROM index_list il
JOIN pg_index ix ON ix.indexrelid = il.index_id
JOIN pg_am am    ON am.oid = (SELECT relam FROM pg_class WHERE oid = il.index_id)
CROSS JOIN LATERAL generate_subscripts(ix.indkey, 1) AS k
GROUP BY il.index_id, il.index_name, il.size_bytes, am.amname, ix.indisprimary, ix.indisunique
ORDER BY il.index_id;

SELECT
  collected_at AS time,
  size_bytes
FROM pganalyze.index_stats
WHERE indexrelid = $index
AND $__timeFilter(collected_at)

SELECT
  collected_at AS time,
  scan - LAG(scan) OVER (PARTITION BY relid ORDER BY collected_at) AS scans_per_interval
FROM pganalyze.index_stats
WHERE indexrelid = $index
AND $__timeFilter(collected_at)

SELECT
  collected_at AS time,
  CASE 
    WHEN (blks_hit + blks_read) > 0 THEN ROUND(100.0 * blks_hit / (blks_hit + blks_read), 2)
    ELSE 0
  END AS "% From Buffer Cache",
  CASE 
    WHEN (blks_hit + blks_read) > 0 THEN ROUND(100.0 * blks_read / (blks_hit + blks_read), 2)
    ELSE 0
  END AS "% From Disk"
FROM pganalyze.index_stats
WHERE indexrelid = $index
AND $__timeFilter(collected_at)

WITH per_table_options AS (
  SELECT
    opt.option_name,
    opt.option_value
  FROM pg_class c
  JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
  CROSS JOIN LATERAL pg_options_to_table(c.reloptions) AS opt
  WHERE c.oid = format('%I.%I', '$schema', '$table')::regclass::oid
),
settings AS (
  SELECT
    name,
    setting
  FROM pg_settings
  WHERE name IN (
    'autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay',
    'autovacuum_vacuum_threshold',
    'autovacuum_freeze_max_age',
    'autovacuum_vacuum_insert_threshold',
    'autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit',
    'autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor',
    'autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age',
    'autovacuum_vacuum_insert_scale_factor'
  )
)
SELECT
  s.name,
  COALESCE(p.option_value, s.setting) AS effective_value
FROM settings s
LEFT JOIN per_table_options p ON p.option_name = s.name
ORDER BY s.name

SELECT
  finished_at AS "Finished at",
  finished_at-started_at AS "Duration",
  tuples_removed AS "Tuples removed",
  tuples_removed / (tuples_removed + tuples_remain) * 100.0 AS "Effectiveness",
  wraparound AS "Anti-wraparound?",
  details AS "Details"
FROM pganalyze.vacuum_stats
WHERE relid = format('%I.%I', '$schema', '$table')::regclass::oid
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
ORDER BY finished_at DESC

WITH settings AS (
  SELECT
    c.oid,
    c.relname,
    COALESCE(
      MAX(CASE WHEN optname = 'autovacuum_vacuum_threshold' THEN optvalue::int END),
      (SELECT setting::int FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'autovacuum_vacuum_threshold')
    ) AS vacuum_threshold,
    COALESCE(
      MAX(CASE WHEN optname = 'autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor' THEN optvalue::float END),
      (SELECT setting::float FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor')
    ) AS vacuum_scale_factor
  FROM pg_class c
  LEFT JOIN LATERAL pg_options_to_table(c.reloptions) AS opt(optname, optvalue) ON true
  WHERE c.oid = format('%I.%I', '$schema', '$table')::regclass::oid
  GROUP BY c.oid, c.relname
)
SELECT 
  ts.collected_at AS time,
  ts.num_dead_rows AS dead_rows,
  (s.vacuum_threshold + s.vacuum_scale_factor * c.reltuples)::int AS threshold
FROM pganalyze.table_stats ts
JOIN settings s ON ts.relid = s.oid
JOIN pg_class c ON c.oid = ts.relid
WHERE ts.relid = format('%I.%I', '$schema', '$table')::regclass::oid
  AND $__timeFilter(ts.collected_at)

WITH threshold AS (
  SELECT
    c.oid AS relid,
    COALESCE(
      (SELECT option_value::int
       FROM pg_options_to_table(c.reloptions) opt
       WHERE opt.option_name = 'autovacuum_freeze_max_age'),
      (SELECT setting::int
       FROM pg_settings
       WHERE name = 'autovacuum_freeze_max_age')
    ) AS freeze_max_age
  FROM pg_class c
  JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
  WHERE n.nspname NOT LIKE '\_timescaledb%'
    AND c.relkind IN ('r','p')
)
SELECT
  ts.collected_at AS time,
  ts.frozen_xid_age,
  t.freeze_max_age AS threshold
FROM pganalyze.table_stats ts
JOIN threshold t ON t.relid = ts.relid
WHERE ts.relid = format('%I.%I', '$schema', '$table')::regclass::oid
  AND $__timeFilter(ts.collected_at)
